title: New Zealand Weekly Review. No. 293. Culture: music and children
brief_description: Introduces the New Zealand National Symphony Orchestra and the special children’s concerts given to stimulate an interest in music. At one performance, students hear the Orchestra’s rendition of “Fingal’s Cave Overture” and “Handel in the Strand” followed by a short explanation by conductor Anderson Tyers.
